overview:
Ricardo Alcocer has 18+ years of experience in the software development industry, focusing on Internet technologies. He is a programmer for web and desktop applications for Windows, Mac and Linux as well as for iOS and Android mobile platforms.

Ricardo has held positions as Programming Director, Production Director and Senior Technology Consultant for several Internet and TELCOs, and has been a professor at the Universidad Politécnica and Universidad del Sagrado Corazón. He is Managing Partner of Aranay Technology Corp. a technology firm specializing on client- server software, webbased applications, content management systems and mobile applications, and co-founder of TaínoApp a software/service that helps publishers bring their content into native mobile applications.

Ricardo’s infrangible desire to share knowledge and grow Puerto Rico’s technological community led him to publish the book “Economía y Productividad con Software Libre” and to establish Tecnologia Libre, a non-for-profit educational organization that promotes technological entrepreneurship through the use of Open Source Software. He appears on the local media promoting Open Standards and teaches courses on web and mobile software development.

Ricardo holds a bachelor’s degree in Computer Sciences from the Bayamón campus of the University of Puerto Rico and belongs to several technology advisory boards.

He is a member of the International Brotherhood of Magicians and the Society of American Magicians.

Ricardo is fully bilingual (English and Spanish).

degrees.subject: Compuer Sciences
degrees.institution: University of Puerto Rico at Bayamón
